      • post

        public java.lang.String post(java.lang.String targetURL,
                             UrlUtils.ContentType contentType,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headerParams,

                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the HTTP content for a POST HTTP URL.
        Parameters:
        targetURL - the POST HTTP URL
        contentType - content type of the URL
        headerParams - headers for the call
        payload - post payload informaton
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the URL fails
